comments.body: Is there any point in exporting `NodeField`? I think it's more of an implementation detail than anything else - `NodeTerm` and `NodeRangedTerm` are using it themselves, but I don't see a need in exporting this `interface` to consumers directly.
Not really.  I didn't use it in my code.  I only exported on the weak principle of allowing users to build polymorphic handlers, but they can do that via unions directly.  I'll strip the export.

Either I'm not seeing the latest changes or something else, because it looks like the `NodeField` and `NodeTerm` are still `export`-ed from the diff I see.

I do see the `type`s being changes to `interface`s though.
